headline: Assessing AES (AES) Valuation As Conflicting Narratives Emerge On Fair Value And Earnings Multiple
summary: Why AES (AES) Is On Investors’ Radar Today AES (AES) is drawing attention after recent trading left the shares around $15.59, with the stock showing mixed short and longer term returns. This performance may prompt investors to reassess how it fits into their portfolios. See our latest analysis for AES. Recent trading has been choppy, with a 1 day share price return of a 1.02% decline contrasted against a 90 day share price return of 10.33%. The 1 year total shareholder return of 52.33% sits...
